articles.title: Delhi HC asks SpiceJet to pay ₹100 cr to Kalanithi Maran by Sept 10 - The Economic Times
articles.description: The Delhi High Court has ordered SpiceJet and its CMD Ajay Singh to pay former promoter Kalanithi Maran ₹100 crore by September 10, or else the airline's assets will be attached. The court rejected SpiceJet's offer to deposit ₹75 crore within 10 days. The cou…
articles.content: The Delhi High Court on Thursday asked SpiceJet and its CMD Ajay Singh to pay former promoter Kalanithi Maran 100 crore by September 10 "as bonafide subject to their rights and contention" or else th… [+1689 chars]

articles.author: Kali Hays
articles.title: Major websites like Amazon and the New York Times are increasingly blocking OpenAI's web crawler GPTBot - Business Insider India
articles.description: OpenAI said this month it was using its own web crawler to collect training data for ChatGPT.It promised not to crawl websites deploy a decades-old web tool,
articles.content: Dozens of large companies including Amazon and The New York Times have rushed to block GPTBot, a tool that OpenAI recently announced it was using to crawl the web for data that would be fed to its po… [+3660 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Quinag exits Manappuram Finance; sells entire stake for Rs 1,177 crore - The Economic Times
articles.description: According to the bulk deal data available with the BSE, Quinag Acquisition (FPI) disposed of 8,37,85,880 shares amounting to a 9.90 per cent stake in Manappuram Finance. The shares were offloaded at an average price of Rs 140.50 apiece, taking the transaction…
articles.content: Foreign fund house Quinag Acquisition on Thursday offloaded its entire stake in Manappuram Finance for Rs 1,177 crore through an open market transaction. According to the bulk deal data available wit… [+1801 chars]

articles.author: CarToq Desk
articles.title: TVS X launched: India’s most expensive electric scooter priced at Rs. 2.5 lakh - CarToq.com
articles.description: TVS Motors has launched its highly anticipated electric scooter, the X, at a starting price of INR 2.50 lakh, making it the most expensive electric scooter available in India. This scooter introduces several noteworthy features to the Indian electric scooter …

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: RBL Bank, 10 others placed under F&O ban on NSE for August 25: check full list | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The NSE updates the list of securities in F&O ban for trade everyday. The derivative contracts in the mentioned securities have crossed 95 per cent of the market-wide position limit and have been currently put in the ban period by the stock exchange, said NSE.
articles.content: A total of 11 stocks have been put under the ban for trade on Friday, August 25, 2023 under the futures and options (F&O) segment by the National Stock Exchange (NSE). The securities have been pu… [+1936 chars]

articles.author: Faizan Haidar
articles.title: Reliance Retail launches youth focused brand Yousta - The Economic Times
articles.description: Reliance Retail, a subsidiary of Reliance Industries, has launched a value apparel format called Yousta to compete with Tata's Zudio, Max from the Landmark group, and InTune from Shoppers Stop. Yousta offers products priced below Rs 999, with the majority pri…

articles.author: Sweta Goswami
articles.title: Green hydrogen mandates for hard-to-abate sectors to be put up before cabinet soon: RK Singh - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The Union minister said in just about 10 months India already has a pipeline of 5.8 million tonnes of green hydrogen and 37 million tonnes of green ammonia orders that have already been backed or are in the pipeline.
articles.content: A proposal to mandate hard-to-abate sectors such as refineries and fertiliser companies to use green hydrogen as feedstock is soon going to be tabled before the Union cabinet, Indias minister for pow… [+2577 chars]
